Burberry London Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.3850

The dank mist does not deter her as she roams around in her favorite city. She loves the vibes of her beloved London prim and proper by day and pulsing with life at night. The city seems to have mastered the art of balancing the old and the new the bygones and the contemporary. The fashion house of Burberry fosters this love with London a luxury Eau de Parfum that captures the essence of all that she holds dear.

Burberry London was created in 2006 by famed perfumer Dominique Ropion with opening notes of mellifluous rose and honeysuckle. The white flower jasmine rules the heart notes with clementine zest Tiare flower and peony casting their tempting shadows over the fragrance. The dry down leaves rich accords of soothing sandalwood velvety musk and patchouli that ground the fragrance leaving you wrapped up in the infallible allure of London. The classy glass bottle is captured in a characteristically Burberry check fabric cover reminiscent of the elegant trench coats from Victorian London. Feel the pulse of the city and get carried away in the quaint charm of it all with Burberry London.

She runs with a single aim her eyes focussed on that point in the future when she will stand on a podium and make her folks proud of her achievements. Her dedication is strengthened by her resolve to be the best the best there ever was. Burberry feeds her passion with Sport a luxury Eau de Toilette that plunges her tired being into depths of fresh icy waters that reinnervate her into trudging forward on her chosen path. The sparkling notes of the fragrance take her on an olfactory journey into a calming re-energising aroma.

The juicy fragrance was created in 2010 by renowned perfumers Olivier Polge and Beatrice Piguet. The tangy yet sweet mandarin combines with spicy ginger and sea salt to create an interesting opening note. Heart notes mellow down with sticky sweet honeysuckle and magnolia which dry down into notes of beautifully familiar musk and cedar. The typical elegance of a colored glass Burberry bottle cannot be topped; the flame red incites hidden emotions that push you towards new heights of action. Feel the fluid dynamics of Burberry Sport that lure you into the heart of a floral cloudburst.

The evening sun turns orange as she stretches out on the patio. The last rays warm her as she sighs and wishes for the summer to never end. She loves the burst of color that her favorite season brings with it cheery and uplifting. The birds that sleep through the winter play hide and seek with the green leaves as the chattering squirrels scurry around foraging for food. Summer is her miracle one that always evokes memories and brings her unbounded happiness. Burberry gifts her the bliss of Summer a luxury Eau de Toilette that captures the very heart of all that is beautiful about summer.

This special edition of Burberry Summer is a beautiful melody of the elements that blend together to create it. The light butterfly touches of freesia rose and water lily combine with the deep flavor of musk along with the crunchy bite of apple to play on your senses leading it down the path of almost frivolous lightness. The soft comfortingly familiar notes of vanilla make the fragrance mouth-wateringly alluring. The sweet feminine aroma is enclosed in a typical Burberry flacon. The transparency of the fragrance seems to indicate the innocence of the simple yet pleasing concoction within. The sunlight brightens up the window as the rays beckon you to live out yet another summer’s day with Burberry Summer.
